attributes.action: stop selling crap screws with everything that needs fixing to a wall
attributes.additional_details: I am totally fed up with the amount of crappy useless screws and rawlplugs supplied with everything from bathroom fittings to cupboards, in fact anything that needs to be attatched to the wall, you get supplied useless screws that dont fit any screwdrivers anyone owns. please make it law that screws must fit scredrivers and be fit for the job and not break or shear off.
